column5: I, and I'm sure all of the Ontario Fishing Community, hope you are having a great Memorial Day. I'm sure that there  are/were some pretty spectacular potluck  meals for family and friends.  Be well.
Right on---hopefully our plumbers are b'havin themselves
And to our friends up north.
Spent 18 months in SC, GA & AL back in my Magna career. Will never forget my US cousins  Cheers to Memorial Day!!
Thanks from Kansas City and home of the Kansas Jayhawks! Appreciate the loan of Andrew Wiggins for a year and now waits to be picked #1 in the NBA.
